data.message: Fixed audit-write concurrency and deletion guardrails: Fixed: 1) Created _append_with_retry() function with exponential backoff (10 retries, 50ms base delay) for Windows-safe file appending, 2) Refactored delete_artifact to use single-open append instead of double-open locking pattern, 3) Deletion now blocks if audit log can't be written (unlogged deletions are unacceptable), 4) Added artifact_types_breakdown to verbose health check showing per-type file vs indexed counts with drift markers. Full deletion flow now: backup (blocks) -> audit write (blocks with retry) -> delete file -> remove from index.
